00001 // Makes "projections" of the 3D hists only 1D and 2D hists. A projection
00002 // is really finding the minimum value along the "integrated" dimension,
00003 // the dimension that is not presented.
00004 
00005 
00006 #ifndef CLHISTPROJECTOR
00007 #define CLHISTPROJECTOR
